isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 25-SI SERIES, TYPES 400 AND 450 - REPAIR PROCEDURES - FIELD COIL CHECKS

svcproc.title: FIELD COIL CHECKS
svcproc.para: To check for grounds, connect an ohmmeter to one field coil lead and to the end frame (Item A, Figure 7). If the ohmmeter reading is low, the field coil is grounded.

calloutgroup.callout1: A. CHECKING FIELD COIL FOR GROUNDS
B. CHECKING FIELD COIL FOR SHORTS AND OPENS

svcproc.para: To check for opens, connect an ohmmeter to the two field coil leads (Item B, Figure 7). If the ohmmeter reading is high (infinite), the field coil is open.

To check the winding for short circuits connect an ohmmeter to the field coil. If the resistance reading is below the specified value, the winding is shorted. The specified resistance value can be determined by dividing the voltage by the current given in SPECIFICATIONS.
